column4: Anyone here use ntfs-3g?  I'm having trouble mounting a drive.
- just a moment.  I want to pastebin
- I am unable to mount the drive
Heh, you just dont have a folder called /mnt/windows
Yes, you do! Write sudo mkdir /mnt/windows
Shouldnt it say mount -t instead of just mount by the way?
I tried that as well and got the same error message
- just a follow up, I was distracted.  Thanks a lot for the hand-holding... I'm off and running!
are you still around?  I'm looking for a little help mounting a "W95 Ext'd" drive (now that my ntfs drives mounted so easily).
